text: Explore, create and discover more in real time. Internships, class projects and industry site visits bring learning to life at MCU.
leveraged his futuristic internship with SpaceX into a full-time role at the rocket and spacecraft company’s headquarters, where they’re commercializing space travel for everyday people.
landed a hyper-competitive internship with the Grammys, where she met nominees ranging from the director of
to a songwriter behind 30  Top 10 hits.
In experiences near and far, business major
is building a sought-after resume — from filming documentaries to interning in Thailand to studying in Italy.
Marymount California University brings you more.
More connections with faculty. More unique approaches to class. More chances to prove yourself. More time for your questions. More focus on your talents.
Set your plan, stay on track and graduate in four years. If you do your part, we’ll do ours. We guarantee it.
Add a one-year MBA to any MCU bachelor’s degree. Earn three degrees in just five years: associate, bachelor’s and MBA.

Explore 20  clubs ranging from Latinos Unidos to the Drama Club. Have fun at events like Silent Disco, carnival or campus cookouts. Join your classmates for discount days at Disneyland, theatrical productions like Cirque du Soleil, pro sports events or faculty-led trips around LA.
Tap into the Southern California lifestyle and LA’s colorful culture.

Arts, culture, sports, food, mountains, beach — whatever you’re looking for, you’ll find it nearby. And being this close to Los Angeles means access to career-launching internships, behind-the-scenes site visits and job opportunities.
Find out what it’s like to be a Marymount Mariner!

Join us on February 1 for a fun-filled day to learn more about the academic, personal and professional opportunities we offer students like you. Meet current students, faculty and staff, and have all your questions answered. RSVP now!

Chinese New Year: Chinese American Museum/Chinatown Field Trip

At Marymount California University, our students and faculty are making a difference every day on our campus, in our community, across the country and around the world. But we don’t do it alone. We do it through the generosity of alumni, parents and friends — like you — who believe in Marymount and the values-based education we provide.

Your annual gifts allow us to provide scholarships to deserving students, recruit faculty, bring new technology to the classroom, build new facilities, support our Mariner student athletes and serve the community.

Come see us! Glimpse what life would be like as a Marymount Mariner. You can meet professors and students, and hear all about our majors. It’s also a good opportunity to learn about financial aid and the admissions process, if you haven’t already applied. In the afternoon, tour our resort-style Villas, where freshman live their first two years.
The day begins at 9 a.m. See you soon!
Or, set up a visit convenient for you
There’s no better way to experience Marymount than to see us in action.
Explore our majors and listen in on a class.
Eat lunch in our our award-winning cafe.
Get the inside scoop about applying from admissions representatives.
Check out our two-story townhomes with an onsite pool.

to arrange a time that works for you.
Allow about two hours to tour, interview and view our residences.
